title: 04/16/2021 - Hour 1 - Eric Mangini
itunes:title: 04/16/2021 - Hour 1 - Eric Mangini
description:
Doug Gottlieb and Rob Parker, in for Dan Patrick, discuss Justin Fields and whether he could be the 3rd pick in the draft. Former NFL head coach Eric Mangini joins the show to discuss the NFL draft, Trevor Lawrence’s comments to Sports Illustrated, and more from around the NFL.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
